messages.content: Can Caldigit docks be used for Thunderbolt networking?
Yes, all CalDigit Thunderbolt docks with more than one Thunderbolt port support Thunderbolt networking, allowing you to use IP over Thunderbolt to connect two computers together.
Is it possible to set up a Thunderbolt network using a CalDigit dock?
Yes, you can set up a Thunderbolt network using CalDigit Thunderbolt docks that have more than one Thunderbolt port. This enables you to connect two computers via IP over Thunderbolt.
Can I network multiple devices using a CalDigit Thunderbolt dock?
Yes, you can network multiple devices using a CalDigit Thunderbolt dock, as long as the dock has multiple Thunderbolt ports to facilitate Thunderbolt networking.

Yes, CalDigit Thunderbolt docks with more than one Thunderbolt port do allow for Thunderbolt networking, enabling the connection of devices via IP over Thunderbolt.

Why does my USB capture device video freeze when connected to a Thunderbolt 4 dock?
The video may freeze because the USB Transfer Mode is set to 'Bulk' or 'Auto'. Change the mode to 'Isochronous' to resolve the issue.
How do you fix USB device video freezing?
The video may freeze because the USB Transfer Mode is set to 'Bulk' or 'Auto'. Change the mode to 'Isochronous' to resolve the issue.
